title: BRIEF-APN Convenience Retail REIT To Acquire 13 Service Station And Convenience Retail Properties
text:
BRIEF-APN Convenience Retail REIT To Acquire 13 Service Station And Convenience Retail Properties

Stock Markets 4 minutes ago (Oct 11, 2019 11:51)

© Reuters. BRIEF-APN Convenience Retail REIT To Acquire 13 Service Station And Convenience Retail Properties Oct 11 (Reuters) - APN Convenience Retail REIT : * ENTERED INTO HEADS OF AGREEMENTS TO ACQUIRE 13 SERVICE STATION AND CONVENIENCE RETAIL PROPERTIES FOR $74.6 MILLION * FUND REAFFIRMS FY20 GUIDANCE * SEES ACQUISITIONS TO BE ACCRETIVE TO FY21 EARNINGS * FUND UNDERTAKING INSTITUTIONAL PLACEMENT TO RAISE ABOUT $38 MILLION AT ISSUE PRICE OF $3.39 PER NEW STAPLED SECURITY * TO REFINANCE ITS EXISTING DEBT FACILITIES, RECEIVED CREDIT APPROVED TERMS TO INCREASE FACILITY LIMIT BY $40 MILLION

BRIEF-APN Convenience Retail REIT To Acquire 13 Service Station And Convenience Retail Properties
description: BRIEF-APN Convenience Retail REIT To Acquire 13 Service Station And Convenience Retail Properties
